Belgium: Aylid, wife of Giele le Hayverlin, sentenced to death for witchcraft by the magistrates of Ouffet: one of the first trials in a local spate of witchcraft accusations.
Death of Maximiliaan de Vriendt, secretary to the city of Ghent
Burma: Anaukpetlun recaptures the Tenasserim coast down to Tavoy, and all of Lan Na
Sweden: The city of Kristianstad is founded.
USA: The Dutch laid claim to the territories of New Netherland.
